mapper.sql: sc.id as sc_id, sc.platform as sc_platform, sc.sms_userful_code as sc_sms_userful_code, sc.sms_userful_name as sc_sms_userful_name, sc.sms_channel_code as sc_sms_channel_code, sc.sms_channel_name as sc_sms_channel_name, sc.sms_sign as sc_sms_sign, sc.request_url as sc_request_url, sc.account as sc_account, sc.password as sc_password, sc.status as sc_status, sc.sort as sc_sort, sc.add_time as sc_add_time, sc.modify_time as sc_modify_time, sc.add_operator_id as sc_add_operator_id, sc.add_operator_name as sc_add_operator_name, sc.modify_operator_id as sc_modify_operator_id, sc.modify_operator_name as sc_modify_operator_name, sc.is_delete as sc_is_delete

select
distinct
from pub_sms_channel sc
order by ${orderByClause}
